thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 17 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Intrum And Intesa Sanpaolo Enter Into A Long Term Strategic Partnership

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Intrum And Intesa Sanpaolo Enter Into A Long Term Strategic Partnership
text:
April 17 (Reuters) - INTRUM JUSTITIA AB:
* INTRUM AND INTESA SANPAOLO ENTER INTO A LONG TERM STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP, CREATING A MARKET LEADING SERVICER OF NON-PERFORMING LOANS IN ITALY
* INTRUM WILL OWN 51% OF JOINT VENTURE SERVICER. * JOINT VENTURE SERVICER ENTERS INTO A 10-YEAR EXCLUSIVE SERVICING AGREEMENT WITH INTESA SANPAOLO FOR VAST MAJORITY OF BANKâ€™S NEW NPL INFLOW DURING THIS PERIOD.
* INTRUM WILL CONSOLIDATE JOINT VENTURE SERVICER IN FINANCIAL REPORTING.
* SAYS INTRUM WILL MAKE AN INITIAL PAYMENT OF EUR 156 M AT END OF APRIL 201
* SAYS REMAINDER OF PURCHASE PRICE WILL BE PAID AT CLOSING, WHICH IS EXPECTED AT YEAR-END 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
